text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Al Mahwit | native_name = المحويت | native_name_lang = ar | settlement_type = Governorate | image_map = Al Mahwit in Yemen.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = |coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Yemen | seat_type = | seat = Al Mahwit | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_total_km2 = 2858 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 597,000 | population_as_of = 2011 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_note = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Al Mahwit ( ) is one of the governorates of Yemen. ==Districts== *Al Khabt District *Al Mahwait District *Al Mahwait City District *Ar Rujum District *At Tawilah District *Bani Sa'd District *Hufash District *Milhan District *Shibam Kawkaban District ==References== Category:Governorates of Yemen
